alternativeNames: ผู้กล้าหยุดเวลา
停止时间的勇者—只能再活三天这种设定对拯救世界来说未免太短了
時間停止勇者―余命３日の設定じゃ世界を救うには短すぎる―
author: Mitsunaga Yasunori
description: KUZUNO Sekai was transported to a medieval fantasy game-like world (isekai). He was given a game controller with the ability to stop time and a 3 days countdown timer. Now he has to figure out the mechanics of this game world and clear it in time.
